imports.quickstart_goal: Import Your Data in 4 Easy Steps
imports.quickstart_goal_description: Follow our guided wizard to migrate your data seamlessly
imports.prereq_data_file: Prepare your data file (CSV, Excel, or XML)
imports.prereq_data_file_hint: Export from your previous system or use our template
imports.prereq_format_hint: Check for special characters and encoding
imports.prereq_time: Set aside 5-10 minutes for the process
imports.new_to_migration_tip: We highly recommend taking the interactive tour to learn all features
imports.upload_step_help_content: Drag and drop your CSV, Excel, or XML file here, or click to browse. Maximum file size is 50MB.
imports.format_help_content: We support CSV (.csv), Excel (.xls, .xlsx), and XML (.xml) files. For best results, use UTF-8 encoding.
imports.template_help_content: Download our pre-formatted templates to see exactly what format we expect. Fill in your data and upload it back.
imports.tips_help_content: Following these tips will help ensure a smooth import process without errors.
imports.help_upload_step1: Drag and drop your file into the upload area
imports.help_upload_step2: Or click the 'Browse Files' button to select a file
imports.help_upload_step3: Wait for the upload to complete (progress bar will show status)
imports.pitfall_file_size: Files larger than 50MB - split into smaller files
imports.pitfall_file_format: Wrong file format - use CSV, Excel, or XML only
imports.pitfall_encoding: Special characters not displaying - ensure UTF-8 encoding
imports.tip_use_templates: Use our templates to avoid formatting errors
imports.tip_test_small_file: Test with a small file first (10-20 records) before importing everything
imports.help_mapping_step2: Click on dropdown to change any incorrect mappings
imports.help_mapping_step3: Ensure all required fields are mapped (marked with red asterisk)
imports.help_validation_step1: Click 'Validate' to check your data for errors
imports.help_validation_step2: Review any validation errors or warnings
imports.help_validation_step3: Fix errors in your source file and re-upload if needed
imports.validation_error_missing_required: Missing required fields - ensure all mandatory columns have values
imports.validation_error_invalid_format: Invalid format - check date formats (YYYY-MM-DD) and number formats
imports.validation_error_duplicate: Duplicate entries - remove duplicate records from your file
imports.help_commit_step1: Review the summary of records to be imported
imports.help_commit_step2: Click 'Commit Import' to start the import process
imports.help_commit_step3: Wait for completion - don't close the browser window
imports.commit_warning: Once you commit the import, the data will be added to your system. This action cannot be undone automatically.
imports.tour_welcome_content: This guided tour will show you how to import your data in 4 simple steps. Let's get started!
imports.tour_upload_content: Drag and drop your CSV, Excel, or XML file here. We support files up to 50MB.
imports.tour_upload_action: Try dragging a file or clicking to browse
imports.tour_template_content: Not sure about the format? Download our pre-formatted templates for customers, items, invoices, and more.
imports.tour_template_action: Click any template button to download
imports.tour_tips_content: These tips will help you avoid common mistakes and ensure a successful import.
imports.tour_progress_content: The sidebar shows your current step and overall progress. You can jump between steps once they're unlocked.
imports.tour_mapping_content: Connect columns from your file to fields in our system. We auto-detect most fields, but you can adjust them.
imports.tour_mapping_action: Select a different field from any dropdown
imports.tour_autodetect_content: Click this button to automatically match your columns based on their names. It saves time!
imports.tour_validation_content: See how many records passed validation and which ones have errors. All errors must be fixed before importing.
imports.tour_errors_content: Click on any error to see details. You can download an error report to fix issues in your source file.
imports.tour_errors_action: Review errors and fix them in your file
imports.tour_commit_content: This is your final chance to review what will be imported. Check the summary carefully.
imports.tour_final_content: When you're ready, click this button to start the import. The process may take a few minutes depending on file size.
imports.tour_final_action: Click when you're ready to proceed
